text: The 1927-28 Austrian football championship was organized by the Vienna Football Association and played by its members. The single-track II. League served as a substructure to the I. League. These leagues were only open to professional football clubs. SK Admira Wien became champion for the second time. This season they also won the Cup. The team that was relegated (alongside the bankrupt Simmering team) was Hakoah, who lost half of their team during their tour to the USA in the spring of 1927. Other federal state associations organized state championships in different modes on an amateur basis. ==Champions of the federal states == *Lower Austriaː Badener AC *Upper Austriaː SV Urfahr *SalzburgːSalzburger AK 1914 *StyriaːGrazer AK *TyrolːFC Veldidena Innsbruck *Vorarlbergː FC Bregenz ==Final table== Table mode (if points are tied): Number of wins - goal quotient Pl.
